      Transforms a sentence by rearranging the dependencies according to whether the predicates have narrow/wide scope.
      void PolarityComposition.transform(Sentence sent)
      Merges the meaning of a polarity shifter with a causal predicate in its scope.
      void PhrasalVerbTransformation.transform(Sentence sent)
      Collapses a verb and its particles if any.
      void PPAttachmentCorrection.transform(Sentence sent)
      Transforms a sentence by re-attaching prepositional phrases.
      void NPInternalTransformation.transform(Sentence sent)
      Transforms a sentence by collapsing NP-internal dependencies using the provided method.
      void ModifierCoordinationCorrection.transform(Sentence sent)
      Transforms a sentence by rearranging the dependencies involved in modifier coordination.
      void HyphenatedAdjectiveTransformation.transform(Sentence sent)
      Transforms a sentence by identifying the predicate and entity components of a complex, hyphenated adjective and splitting the adjective in such a way that relations can be constructed later.

      Transforms a sentence by binding generic semantic objects to certain textual units.

      Transforms a Sentence object using the transformation rule.
